General.Name: Hebei Huatong Wires and Cables Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hebei Huatong Wires and Cables Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells wires and cables in China. Its products include XLPE insulating power cables with voltage up to 35kV, PVC insulated power cables, mining cables, general rubber sheathed flexible cables, submersible oil pump cables, locomotive-vehicle cables, shipboard offshore cables and navy cables, nuclear station cables, pre-fabricated branch cables, aerial cables, control cables, special cables, the motor winding connecting conductors, aluminum stranded conductors and aluminum stranded steel-core reinforced conductors, and others. The company also offers wind power cables, marine cables, low voltage plastic cables, medium voltage cross-linked cables, mine plastic insulated power cables, urd cables, overhead conductors and insulated cables, computer and instrumentation cables, cloth wires, photovoltaic cables, metal armoured cables, and hydraulic control pipes. In addition, it provides oil and gas field operation, sucker rod operation, and nitrogen equipment. The company's products are used in power transmission systems, Clean energy, petroleum, industrial cables, marine projects, and coal applications. It also exports its products to the United States, Holland, Italy, Russia, Britain, Australia, New Zealand, Ethiopia, Ghana, Congo, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia. Hebei Huatong Wires and Cables Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Tangshan, China.
